configuration.label: Google Analytics Measurement ID
configuration.description: Add Google Analytics tracking to your documentation site by providing a Measurement ID. You must set it up as Google Analytics 4 (recommended).

configuration.label: Intercom API key
configuration.description: Add Intercom to your documentation site by providing an API key

configuration.label: Hotjar site ID
configuration.description: Add Hotjar to your documentation site by providing a Site ID

configuration.label: Top Menu Logo
configuration.description: Company logo to be shown on all pages inside the documentation site. 200x30px .svg or .png is recommended

configuration.label: Site Favicon
configuration.description: Documentation site favicon. 32x32px .png is recommended, using legacy .ico is discouraged

configuration.label: Page Header Background Image
configuration.description: If provided, the header background image for each page will use this image. You can still change the setting per-page

configuration.label: Page Header Background Color
configuration.description: If provided, the header background color for each page will use this color. You can still change the setting per-page

configuration.label: Page Header Text Color
configuration.description: If provided, the header text color for each page will use this color. You can still change the setting per-page

configuration.label: Page Header Height (px)
configuration.description: If provided, the header for each page will be this tall (px). You can still change the setting per-page. Use 0 to disable

configuration.label: Enable Search Engine Indexing
configuration.description: When enabled, documentation site will be indexed by search engines. Note that only public documentation sites can be indexed

configuration.label: Enable Search Engine Link Follow
configuration.description: When enabled, search robots will follow the links on the indexed pages

configuration.label: Generate Sitemap
configuration.description: When enabled, documentation sitemap will be re-generated on every publish

configuration.label: Site Title Prefix
configuration.description: When provided, page title will be prefixed with this string

configuration.label: Site Title Suffix
configuration.description: When provided, page title will be suffixed with this string

configuration.label: Site Title Override
configuration.description: When provided, title will be completely overriden by this string for all site pages. Prefix is ignored in this case

configuration.label: Site Description Prefix
configuration.description: When provided, page description will be prefixed with this string

configuration.label: Site Description Suffix
configuration.description: When provided, page description will be suffixed with this string
configuration.default: | Design system documentation, made with ❤️ using Supernova

configuration.label: Site Description Override
configuration.description: When provided, page description will use this string. Otherwise, page description is generated dynamically from page subheading (if any) or its content.

configuration.label: Site Image Override
configuration.description: When provided, page description will use this string. Otherwise, page description is generated dynamically from page subheading (if any) or its content.

configuration.label: Markdown private token
configuration.description: If provided, your markdown will authenticate using this token. Token must contain its type, format: ['basic' | 'Bearer' | 'token'] [token].

configuration.label: Show Next / Previous navigation
configuration.description: When enabled, will show bottom page navigation with quick links to next and previous pages

configuration.label: Show Footer
configuration.description: Any custom javascript to change the documentation behavior. Custom JS will be injected last after DOM is loaded.

configuration.label: Custom Footer Code
configuration.description: When footer is shown, the footer can be fully customized by changing its HTML representation. Add links, lines or even images, any html will work.
configuration.default:
My Doc Site

This footer can be completely changed through Supernova customization options. Head to site advanced customization to learn more!

configuration.label: Custom CSS
configuration.description: Any custom styles to change the documentation look & feel. Custom CSS is injected last, overriding everything before it.

configuration.label: Custom Head Code
configuration.description: Any custom head code you want to inject into the head. You can inject new metatags, css or js using this method.

configuration.label: Custom Font - Header
configuration.description: Fonts you want loaded into your site. You can load multiple fonts at the same time. Icon fonts are also supported.

configuration.label: Show Site CTA
configuration.description: When enabled, documentation will add CTA button into the top bar. CTA can lead to any link you provide.

configuration.label: Site CTA - Text
configuration.description: Text of the CTA button.

configuration.label: Site CTA - URL to open
configuration.description: Link which will open when CTA button is clicked by the user.

configuration.label: Site CTA - Open in new tab
configuration.description: When enabled, CTA url you provided will open in a new tab.

configuration.label: Show Version Dropdown
configuration.description: When enabled, version dropdown will be shown that allows readers to select which version of docs to read.

configuration.label: Editable React Widgets
configuration.description: When React code widget is used, users can edit the code to see the components change in real-time.

configuration.label: Open in Codesandbox.io
configuration.description: When React code widget is used, users can open its code and play around with it in Codesandbox.io.

blocks.title: Markdown
blocks.description: Embed and process markdown from remote URL

blocks.title: Component Health (beta)
blocks.description: Show component health and additional attributes

blocks.title: Component Checklist (beta)
blocks.description: Highlight specific features of your components

blocks.title: All Component Checklist (beta)
blocks.description: Highlight specific features of all of your components
